name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DevOps sprint board task Parent Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display task parent in DevOps sprint boards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When your browser is displaying an Azure DevOps sprint board, click the extension to extend each task with a parent field. This give an quick overview of where the task is from when using group by people.
